titleStmt.title: A continuation of the second part of the enquiry into the reasons offered by Sa. Oxon for the abrogating of the test: relating to the idolatry of the Church of Rome.
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
Parker, Samuel, 1640-1688. Reasons for abrogating the test, imposed upon all members of Parliament anno 1678. Octob. 30.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).

A continuation of "An enquiry into the reasons for abrogating the test imposed on all members of parliament" by Gilbert Burnet and a reply to "Reasons for abrogating the test, imposed upon all members of Parliament anno 1678. Octob. 30" by Samual Parker. Cf. Folger Shakespeare Library.
Copy at 2919:1 is improved over the defective copy found on reel 1755:32. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: copy at 1755:32 has pages 3-6 lacking.
Reproduction of originals in: University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library (reel 1755:32) and Folger Shakespeare Library (reel 2919:1).
